item: All actions possible with keyboard only
Focus order logical; no traps; visible focus
Skip link working (jump to main content)
Enter key submits forms where expected
Labels properly associated (for + id)
Required fields marked (required attribute + visual indicator)
Errors linked via aria-describedby (field & summary)
Error messages have role="alert" or role="status"
Status/messages announced via role="status" or role="alert"
Live regions don't interrupt navigation (aria-live="polite")
Focus management after dynamic updates (new content receives focus if needed)
Full-page path equivalent to HTMX path (all tasks completable)
Error messages visible after POST-Redirect-GET
Confirmation messages shown (e.g. "Task added successfully")
Delete confirmation present (or documented trade-off)
Text contrast meets WCAG AA (4.5:1 for normal text)
UI component contrast meets WCAG AA (3:1)
All content readable at 200% zoom
No horizontal scroll at 200% zoom
Text resizable without assistive tech
Proper heading hierarchy (h1 → h2 → h3)
Landmarks present (nav main aside footer)
Lists use proper markup (ul ol li)
aria-label or aria-labelledby used correctly
aria-describedby links hints and errors to inputs
No ARIA if native HTML works (button over div role="button")
Alt text provided for meaningful images
Decorative images have alt="" or role="presentation"
Link text descriptive (not "click here")
Links visually distinguishable from surrounding text
Table headers (th) properly scoped (scope="col" or "row")
